charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2100:

charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2300:
暴雪王真是的，在小菘我道謝之前，

charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2800:

charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3000: 但是暴雪王一直趕我走。
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3100:

charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3200:
